text:
Apple has launched the new M4 MacBook Air with a new sky blue color, now starting at $999

You can order today and will be available on March 12
Sky Blue, one of the best colors ever
You know, that color is actually quite nice

New MacBook Air with M4 chip key features:

•  M4 chip with 10-core CPU and 10-core GPU for up to 2x faster performance than M1 models

•  New sky blue color option joining midnight, starlight, and silver

•  Lower starting price of $999 ($100 less than before)

•  16GB RAM
That’s a cool color…..  can’t imagine the average user will see much a difference between M3 and M4.

M4 MacBook Air at $999

This is such a great value.

They still kept the base model as 256gb, what the helll bruhhh, 256gb in 2025, not justified ;-; 
I was expecting 512gb as base model , ;-;
So is like I want an iPhone or a MacBook. Mmmm
Love the color hate the price. Get an m2 instead for half this
@AskPerplexity how much is it in india

It is a very interesting choice for Apple to go with another muted blue color.

I guess that's their thing with the Air line.
@AskPerplexity  How many monitors does it support?
Apple dropping prices? That’s rare! Now let’s see if the base model actually ships with decent storage.
Nothing new here. And @tim_cook is publishing this a world first new designed macbook. Such a shit.
Sky blue M4 MacBook Air at $999...Apple’s making it tempting to upgrade, but is 256GB still enough storage in 2025???
always dying with the macbook ports
256 kinda sucks but overall this is actually pretty good considering they even took off $100
I wont buy a Macbook Air until apple makes it 14 inch
The sky blue M4 MacBook Air is a sleek upgrade. Can't wait to see how it performs in real life!
I want that blue sky color in the MacBook Pro models
Seems like any other MacBook air I've seen.
The new sky blue color would be much more beautiful in real life!

The new MacBook Air looks amazing! With the powerful M4 chip, smart Apple Intelligence capabilities, and the irresistible sky blue color, using it will be an unforgettable experience! Are you ready to discover the power of this device?
